name: Tearing Down Gods 02
description:
It’s not that the raging, ragged entrance to the new golden age is the new golden age. It’s not that theory can’t bear a riot. It’s just that riot makes new ways of seeing what theory can and can’t do and imposes upon us a kind of knowledge of our own embarrassing and already given resources of enjoyment.

Reading List:
- The Rebirth of History: Times of Riots and Uprisings by Alain Badiou
- Riot. Strike. Riot: The New Era of Uprisings by Joshua Clover
- At Daggers Drawn with the Existent, its Defenders and its False Critics - Anonymous
